about_the_game:
Your team is gone, wiped out the moment you entered this mysterious silicon-based realm. Now, it’s up to you to find your way home, alone.

Harness the power of your Nanobot technology to stay alive, no matter the odds. Their energy is finite, so gather resources so that they can enhance your equipment, weapons, and even your abilities. Define your own unique survival strategy against relentless waves of enemies.

Play Your Way

  • Precision Weapons: Take control with manually wielded weapons.

  • Automated Nanobot Weapons: Let your nanobots do the fighting.

  • Defensive Static Weapons: Fortify your position and defend.

This game is designed to adapt to your playstyle. The real challenge lies in discovering the perfect combination of upgrades to match your strategy and succeed.

Reach the Portal Home

Your mission is straightforward: find the Portal home. Each run features a single portal—can you locate it? Can you reach it? The locals view you as a virus. They want to eradicate you and will stop at nothing to prevent your escape.

If you do manage to reach the portal, where will it lead you? To another part of this bizarre alien world, or back home to your family and friends?

Unleash Your Inner Warrior with Nanobot Upgrades

Dive into a world where your every move is enhanced by cutting-edge Nanobot technology. Gather resources and upgrade your body and weapons with hundreds of unique upgrades. The possibilities are endless, and the playstyles are nearly infinite.

Are you a precision FPS player?

  • Seek out the highest vantage points, fortify your defenses, and grab your sniper as you pick off enemies with deadly accuracy.

Run and gun enthusiast?

  • Grab your assault rifle and shotgun, charge up your shields, and dive headfirst into the action. No enemy stands a chance!

Master strategist?

  • Set up a perimeter with automated weapons, don your heaviest armor, and draw the enemy into your trap. Watch as they fall one by one.

No matter your playstyle, there’s a perfect combination waiting for you. But remember, perfection comes at a price. How many times will you fall before you master the art of survival?

Battle Relentless Waves of Foes

Dynamic Gameplay

No two games are the same. With procedurally generated levels, every playthrough offers a fresh experience. Adapt to ever-changing environments and enemies. Each wave brings new combinations of enemies and weapons to face. Will that previous winning strategy work again?

Strategic Choices

Your path is yours to choose. Will you take the safer route, gathering resources and building your strength, or will you dive headfirst into danger, seeking out powerful enemies and rare treasures? Grind for the perfect upgrade combination or trust to luck and quick reactions?

Unique Challenges and Opportunities

Face off against a variety of enemies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Utilize a diverse arsenal of weapons and abilities to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Can you adapt swiftly enough to overcome the challenges that lie ahead?

Endless Replayability

With countless combinations of regions, enemies, and strategies, Rogue Wave offers endless replayability. Challenge yourself to achieve higher scores, unlock new abilities, and become the ultimate rogue warrior.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 3200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 285 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 3200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 (4 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 480 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Rogue Wave is a First Person Roguelite Horde Shooter. You will face hundreds of enemies in each level of this procedurally generated world. Death offers a chance to re-combine Nanobot upgrades with your FPS skills. Can you find the right mix of auto-battler and precision tactics to get home?
